meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sarah Robertson Mike Nichols Mary Treisbach Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4407.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Sarah Robertson, a media planner from Los Angeles, California
Mike Nichols, a commercial pilot from Lawrenceville, Georgia
Mary Treisbach, a marketing consultant from Norristown, Pennsylvania (whose 1-day cash winnings total $6,200)

tr.td: HY-ER EDUCATION
CLASSIC SITCOM EPISODES
CRIME
BABYTALK MAG'S 10 MOST FAMOUS BABIES
JESSE
